Package main

Class PathFinder.Node

java.lang.Object
main.PathFinder.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<PathFinder.Node>
Enclosing class:
PathFinder
private static class PathFinder.Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<PathFinder.Node>
A inner class used to encapsulate information regarding the maps nodes, such as it's cost, position, and depth of path finding at the current moment of calculation. The parameters of this class are highly volatile and shouldn't be relied upon until path finding has completed.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private float cost
    The movement cost to get to this node
    private int depth
    The amount of nodes that have been investigated before this node was found.
    private float heuristic
    The heuristic cost to get to this node (manhattan distance)
    private PathFinder.Node parent
    The node that was checked before this one; ie the parent.
    private int x
    The X position of this node
    private int y
    The Y position of this node

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Node​(int x, int y)
    Node constructor simply sets the X and Y position of the node to the arguments provided

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int compareTo​(PathFinder.Node b)
    A comparing function used by Collections.sort.
    protected int setParentNode​(PathFinder.Node parent)
    Sets the parent of this node to the node provided, and returns the current depth of this nodes pathfinding.

  • Field Details

    • x

      private final int x
      The X position of this node

    • y

      private final int y
      The Y position of this node

    • depth

      private int depth
      The amount of nodes that have been investigated before this node was found. i.e: the depth

    • cost

      private float cost
      The movement cost to get to this node
      See Also:
      PathFinder.getPathCost(int, int)

    • heuristic

      private float heuristic
      The heuristic cost to get to this node (manhattan distance)
      See Also:
      PathFinder.getHeuristicCost(int, int, int, int)

    • parent

      private PathFinder.Node parent
      The node that was checked before this one; ie the parent. This node must be a neighbour of this node and any entity path finding to this node must first pass through the parent.

  • Constructor Details

    • Node

      public Node​(int x, int y)
      Node constructor simply sets the X and Y position of the node to the arguments provided
      Parameters:
      x - The X position of this node (grid relative)
      y - The Y position of this node (grid relative)

  • Method Details

    • setParentNode

      protected int setParentNode​(PathFinder.Node parent)
      Sets the parent of this node to the node provided, and returns the current depth of this nodes pathfinding.
      Parameters:
      parent - The parent to set
      Returns:
      The depth of path finding required to reach this node.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(PathFinder.Node b)
      A comparing function used by Collections.sort. Sorts the nodes based on their cost (combined heuristic and movement cost)
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<PathFinder.Node>
      Parameters:
      b - The node being compared against this one
      Returns:
      Returns an integer representing the sort result. 0 = no change, -1 sort down, 1 sort up.
